Then<S>1161</S> Agrippa<S>67</S> said<S>5346</S> unto<S>4314</S> Paul<S>3972</S>, Thou<S>4671</S> art permitted<S>2010</S> to speak<S>3004</S> for<S>5228</S> thyself<S>4572</S>. Then<S>5119</S> Paul<S>3972</S> stretched forth<S>1614</S> the hand<S>5495</S>, and answered for himself<S>626</S>:
I think<S>2233</S> myself<S>1683</S> happy<S>3107</S>, king<S>935</S> Agrippa<S>67</S>, because I shall<S>3195</S> answer for myself<S>626</S> this day<S>4594</S> before<S>1909</S> thee<S>4675</S> touching<S>4012</S> all the things<S>3956</S> whereof<S>3739</S> I am accused<S>1458</S> of<S>5259</S> the Jews<S>2453</S>:
Especially<S>3122</S> because I know<S>1492</S> thee<S>4571</S> to be<S>5607</S> expert<S>1109</S> <S>5037</S> in all<S>3956</S> customs<S>1485</S> and<S>2532</S> questions<S>2213</S> which are among<S>2596</S> the Jews<S>2453</S>: wherefore<S>1352</S> I beseech<S>1189</S> thee<S>4675</S> to hear<S>191</S> me<S>3450</S> patiently<S>3116</S>.
My<S>3450</S> manner<S>3303</S> <S>3767</S> of life<S>981</S> from<S>1537</S> my youth<S>3503</S>, which<S>3588</S> was<S>1096</S> at<S>575</S> the first<S>746</S> among<S>1722</S> mine<S>3450</S> own nation<S>1484</S> at<S>1722</S> Jerusalem<S>2414</S>, know<S>2467</S> all<S>3956</S> the Jews<S>2453</S>;
Which knew<S>4267</S> me<S>3165</S> from the beginning<S>509</S>, if<S>1437</S> they would<S>2309</S> testify<S>3140</S>, that<S>3754</S> after<S>2596</S> the most straitest<S>196</S> sect<S>139</S> of our<S>2251</S> religion<S>2356</S> I lived<S>2198</S> a Pharisee<S>5330</S>.
And<S>2532</S> now<S>3568</S> I stand<S>2476</S> and am judged<S>2919</S> for<S>1909</S> the hope<S>1680</S> of the promise<S>1860</S> made<S>1096</S> of<S>5259</S> God<S>2316</S> unto<S>4314</S> our fathers<S>3962</S>:
Unto<S>1519</S> which<S>3739</S> promise our<S>2257</S> twelve tribes<S>1429</S>, instantly<S>1722</S> <S>1616</S> serving<S>3000</S> God day<S>2250</S> and<S>2532</S> night<S>3571</S>, hope<S>1679</S> to come<S>2658</S>. For<S>4012</S> which<S>3739</S> hope's sake<S>1680</S>, king<S>935</S> Agrippa<S>67</S>, I am accused<S>1458</S> of<S>5259</S> the Jews<S>2453</S>. <sup>day and night: Gr. night and day</sup>
Why<S>5101</S> should it be thought a thing<S>2919</S> incredible<S>571</S> with<S>3844</S> you<S>5213</S>, that<S>1487</S> God<S>2316</S> should raise<S>1453</S> the dead<S>3498</S>?
I<S>1473</S> verily<S>3303</S> <S>3767</S> thought<S>1380</S> with myself<S>1683</S>, that I ought<S>1163</S> to do<S>4238</S> many things<S>4183</S> contrary<S>1727</S> to<S>4314</S> the name<S>3686</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S> of Nazareth<S>3480</S>.
Which thing<S>3739</S> I<S>4160</S> also<S>2532</S> did<S>4160</S> in<S>1722</S> Jerusalem<S>2414</S>: and<S>2532</S> many<S>4183</S> of the saints<S>40</S> did<S>2623</S> I<S>1473</S> shut up<S>2623</S> in prison<S>5438</S>, having received<S>2983</S> authority<S>1849</S> from<S>3844</S> the chief priests<S>749</S>; and<S>5037</S> when they<S>846</S> were put to death<S>337</S>, I gave<S>2702</S> my voice<S>5586</S> against them.
And<S>2532</S> I punished<S>5097</S> them<S>846</S> oft<S>4178</S> in<S>2596</S> every<S>3956</S> synagogue<S>4864</S>, and compelled<S>315</S> them to blaspheme<S>987</S>; and<S>5037</S> being<S>1693</S> exceedingly<S>4057</S> mad against<S>1693</S> them<S>846</S>, I persecuted<S>1377</S> them even<S>2532</S> unto<S>1519</S> <S>2193</S> strange<S>1854</S> cities<S>4172</S>.
<S>2532</S> Whereupon<S>1722</S> <S>3739</S> as I went<S>4198</S> to<S>1519</S> Damascus<S>1154</S> with<S>3326</S> authority<S>1849</S> and<S>2532</S> commission<S>2011</S> from<S>3844</S> the chief priests<S>749</S>,
At midday<S>2250</S> <S>3319</S>, O king<S>935</S>, I saw<S>1492</S> in<S>2596</S> the way<S>3598</S> a light<S>5457</S> from heaven<S>3771</S>, above<S>5228</S> the brightness<S>2987</S> of the sun<S>2246</S>, shining round about<S>4034</S> me<S>3165</S> and<S>2532</S> them which journeyed<S>4198</S> with<S>4862</S> me<S>1698</S>.
And<S>1161</S> when we<S>2257</S> were<S>2667</S> all<S>3956</S> fallen<S>2667</S> to<S>1519</S> the earth<S>1093</S>, I heard<S>191</S> a voice<S>5456</S> speaking<S>2980</S> unto<S>4314</S> me<S>3165</S>, and<S>2532</S> saying<S>3004</S> in the Hebrew<S>1446</S> tongue<S>1258</S>, Saul<S>4549</S>, Saul<S>4549</S>, why<S>5101</S> persecutest thou<S>1377</S> me<S>3165</S>? it is hard<S>4642</S> for thee<S>4671</S> to kick<S>2979</S> against<S>4314</S> the pricks<S>2759</S>.
And<S>1161</S> I<S>1473</S> said<S>2036</S>, Who<S>5101</S> art thou<S>1488</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>? And<S>1161</S> he said<S>2036</S>, I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> whom<S>3739</S> thou<S>4771</S> persecutest<S>1377</S>.
But<S>235</S> rise<S>450</S>, and<S>2532</S> stand<S>2476</S> upon<S>1909</S> thy<S>4675</S> feet<S>4228</S>: for<S>1063</S> I have appeared<S>3700</S> unto thee<S>4671</S> for<S>1519</S> this purpose<S>5124</S>, to make<S>4400</S> thee<S>4571</S> a minister<S>5257</S> and<S>2532</S> a witness<S>3144</S> both<S>5037</S> of these things which<S>3739</S> thou hast seen<S>1492</S>, and<S>5037</S> of those things in the which<S>3739</S> I will appear<S>3700</S> unto thee<S>4671</S>;
Delivering<S>1807</S> thee<S>4571</S> from<S>1537</S> the people<S>2992</S>, and<S>2532</S> from the Gentiles<S>1484</S>, unto<S>1519</S> whom<S>3739</S> now<S>3568</S> I send<S>649</S> thee<S>4571</S>,
To open<S>455</S> their<S>846</S> eyes<S>3788</S>, and to turn<S>1994</S> them from<S>575</S> darkness<S>4655</S> to<S>1519</S> light<S>5457</S>, and<S>2532</S> from the power<S>1849</S> of Satan<S>4567</S> unto<S>1909</S> God<S>2316</S>, that they<S>846</S> may receive<S>2983</S> forgiveness<S>859</S> of sins<S>266</S>, and<S>2532</S> inheritance<S>2819</S> among<S>1722</S> them which are sanctified<S>37</S> by faith<S>4102</S> that is in<S>1519</S> me<S>1691</S>.
Whereupon<S>3606</S>, O king<S>935</S> Agrippa<S>67</S>, I was<S>1096</S> not<S>3756</S> disobedient<S>545</S> unto the heavenly<S>3770</S> vision<S>3701</S>:
But<S>235</S> shewed<S>518</S> <S>518</S> first<S>4412</S> unto them of<S>1722</S> Damascus<S>1154</S>, and<S>2532</S> at Jerusalem<S>2414</S>, and<S>5037</S> throughout<S>1519</S> all<S>3956</S> the coasts<S>5561</S> of Judaea<S>2449</S>, and<S>2532</S> then to the Gentiles<S>1484</S>, that they should repent<S>3340</S> and<S>2532</S> turn<S>1994</S> to<S>1909</S> God<S>2316</S>, and do<S>4238</S> works<S>2041</S> meet<S>514</S> for repentance<S>3341</S>.
For<S>1752</S> these causes<S>5130</S> the Jews<S>2453</S> caught<S>4815</S> me<S>3165</S> in<S>1722</S> the temple<S>2411</S>, and went about<S>3987</S> to kill<S>1315</S> me.
Having<S>5177</S> therefore<S>3767</S> obtained<S>5177</S> help<S>1947</S> of<S>3844</S> God<S>2316</S>, I continue<S>2476</S> unto<S>891</S> this<S>5026</S> day<S>2250</S>, witnessing<S>3140</S> both<S>5037</S> to small<S>3398</S> and<S>2532</S> great<S>3173</S>, saying<S>3004</S> none other things<S>3762</S> than<S>1622</S> those which<S>3739</S> <S>5037</S> the prophets<S>4396</S> and<S>2532</S> Moses<S>3475</S> did say<S>2980</S> should<S>3195</S> come<S>1096</S>:
That<S>1487</S> Christ<S>5547</S> should suffer<S>3805</S>, and that<S>1487</S> he should be the first<S>4413</S> that should rise<S>386</S> from<S>1537</S> the dead<S>3498</S>, and should<S>3195</S> shew<S>2605</S> light<S>5457</S> unto the people<S>2992</S>, and<S>2532</S> to the Gentiles<S>1484</S>.
And<S>1161</S> as he<S>846</S> thus<S>5023</S> spake for himself<S>626</S>, Festus<S>5347</S> said<S>5346</S> with a loud<S>3173</S> voice<S>5456</S>, Paul<S>3972</S>, thou art beside thyself<S>3105</S>; much<S>4183</S> learning<S>1121</S> doth make<S>4062</S> thee<S>4571</S> mad<S>1519</S> <S>3130</S>.
But<S>1161</S> he said<S>5346</S>, I am<S>3105</S> not<S>3756</S> mad<S>3105</S>, most noble<S>2903</S> Festus<S>5347</S>; but<S>235</S> speak forth<S>669</S> the words<S>4487</S> of truth<S>225</S> and<S>2532</S> soberness<S>4997</S>.
For<S>1063</S> the king<S>935</S> knoweth<S>1987</S> of<S>4012</S> these<S>5130</S> things, before<S>4314</S> whom<S>3739</S> also<S>2532</S> I speak<S>2980</S> freely<S>3955</S>: for<S>1063</S> I am persuaded<S>3982</S> that<S>3756</S> none<S>5100</S> <S>3762</S> of these things<S>5130</S> are hidden<S>2990</S> from him<S>846</S>; for<S>1063</S> this thing<S>5124</S> was<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> done<S>4238</S> in<S>1722</S> a corner<S>1137</S>.
King<S>935</S> Agrippa<S>67</S>, believest thou<S>4100</S> the prophets<S>4396</S>? I know<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> thou believest<S>4100</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> Agrippa<S>67</S> said<S>5346</S> unto<S>4314</S> Paul<S>3972</S>, Almost<S>1722</S> <S>3641</S> thou persuadest<S>3982</S> me<S>3165</S> to be<S>1096</S> a Christian<S>5546</S>.
And<S>1161</S> Paul<S>3972</S> said<S>2036</S>, I would<S>302</S> <S>2172</S> to God<S>2316</S>, that not<S>3756</S> only<S>3440</S> thou<S>4571</S>, but<S>235</S> also<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> that hear<S>191</S> me<S>3450</S> this day<S>4594</S>, were<S>1096</S> both<S>2532</S> almost<S>1722</S> <S>3641</S>, and<S>2532</S> altogether<S>1722</S> <S>4183</S> such<S>5108</S> as<S>3697</S> <S>2504</S> I am<S>1510</S>, except<S>3924</S> these<S>5130</S> bonds<S>1199</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when he<S>846</S> had<S>2036</S> thus<S>5023</S> spoken<S>2036</S>, the king<S>935</S> rose up<S>450</S>, and<S>2532</S> the governor<S>2232</S>, and<S>5037</S> Bernice<S>959</S>, and<S>2532</S> they that sat with<S>4775</S> them<S>846</S>:
And<S>2532</S> when they were gone aside<S>402</S>, they talked<S>2980</S> between<S>4314</S> themselves<S>240</S>, saying<S>3004</S>,<S>3754</S> This<S>3778</S> man<S>444</S> doeth<S>4238</S> nothing<S>3762</S> worthy<S>514</S> of death<S>2288</S> or<S>2228</S> of bonds<S>1199</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> said<S>5346</S> Agrippa<S>67</S> unto Festus<S>5347</S>, This<S>3778</S> man<S>444</S> might<S>1410</S> have been set at liberty<S>630</S>, if<S>1508</S> he had<S>1941</S> not<S>1508</S> appealed unto<S>1941</S> Caesar<S>2541</S>.
